title: Subpart 8191-4 - Verification Of Sales For Use As Observations In The Measurement Of Municipal Full Value
content:
Subpart 8191-4 - Verification Of Sales For Use As Observations In The Measurement Of Municipal Full Value

State Regulations
ยง 8191-4.1 - Criteria for sales included as observations in the measurement of full value

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
